title: Pixel 5 brand new - no sound from top speaker
content:
Hi everyone, 
I was surprised when i first used my pixel 5 that no sound was going out from the top speaker when watching videos in landscape mode for instance (youtube)

Does that happen to anyone else ?
I ve tested on a pixel 4 and the sound is just more balanced since coming from both sides of the screen...

All up to latest updates, including Android.

Hope some can help üòÅ

Thanks everyone
